com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.config
Class KafkaProducerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.config.KafkaClientConfiguration
      com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.config.KafkaProducerConfiguration

public class KafkaProducerConfiguration
extends KafkaClientConfiguration

Configuration for the Kafka producer.

By default, the producer will be synchronous, blocking the calling thread until the message has been sent.

To use an asynchronous producer, set async with the desired properties.

Field Summary

          Configuration for the asynchronous producer, defaults to synchronous.

          Maximum size of a message payload.
protected  int partitionMissRetries
          Number of retries for refreshing the partition cache after a cache miss.
protected  long reconnectInterval
          Number of produce requests to a broker after which to reset the connection.
protected  Size sendBufferSize
          Size of the client-side send buffer.

Field Detail

sendBufferSize

@NotNull
protected Size sendBufferSize
Size of the client-side send buffer.

connectionTimeout

@NotNull
protected Duration connectionTimeout
Maximum time to wait on connection to a broker.

reconnectInterval

@Min(value=0L)
protected long reconnectInterval
Number of produce requests to a broker after which to reset the connection.

maxMessageSize

@NotNull
protected Size maxMessageSize
Maximum size of a message payload.

Attempts to produce a Message with a payload that exceeds this limit will cause the producer to throw a kafka.common.MessageSizeTooLargeException.

compression

protected Compression compression
Compression codec for compressing all messages.

See Also:
getCompression()

compressedTopics

protected String[] compressedTopics
Optional list of the topics to compress.

If compression is enabled, this filters the topics compression is enabled for. Leaving this empty and enabling compression will cause all topics to be compressed.

partitionMissRetries

@Min(value=0L)
protected int partitionMissRetries
Number of retries for refreshing the partition cache after a cache miss.

async

protected KafkaAsyncProducerConfiguration async
Configuration for the asynchronous producer, defaults to synchronous.

If this is provided, the producer will be asynchronous; otherwise, it will be synchronous.

See Also:
KafkaAsyncProducerConfiguration

isAsync

public boolean isAsync()
Determines whether the configured producer should be asynchronous.

Returns:
true if the producer should be asynchronous; otherwise, false.
